Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Wherever \Wher*ev"er\, adv. At or in whatever place; wheresoever. [1913 Webster]
He can not but love virtue wherever it is. --Atterbury. [1913 Webster]
wherever adv : in or at or to what place; "I know where he is"; "use it wherever necessary" [syn: {where}]
